tag_professor: Inspirational (3)  Respected (3)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
comments: Walks the talk! Until Dr. Esperanza, I thought inspiring, motivated, and truly compassionate educators were a myth. She grades fairly. Respects and welcomes all input in class discussions. Focus is less on assigning anxiety-provoking amounts of homework and tests, more on educating and empowering. I am lucky to have met her.

tag_professor: Inspirational (3)  Respected (3)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
stu_tags: GROUP PROJECTS  CARING  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Such a very nice person. Very easy. Can be opinionated. Relies on in class participation and small group work during class. Not a ton of homework. As long as you participate, do the homework, and pay attention, you will do fine. Understands the night class struggle of work and school balance which is appreciated.

tag_professor: Inspirational (3)  Respected (3)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
stu_tags: AMAZING LECTURES  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  RESPECTED
comments: She is absolutely the BEST professor I ever had! IF you have the chance please take her. She is very inspirational and her lectures are very fun. She will give you a book you can buy off Amazon instead of the pricey ones from the book store. I would definitely take another class with her.

tag_professor: Inspirational (3)  Respected (3)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
comments: She is and always will be my all time favorite teacher. I\'m no genius at all but I got an A in her class. Her homework is so amazingly easy and she never gives out tests. She will throw chocolate at you if you answer her questions correctly as well. She has given me so much inspiration in life to become a better person. Please take her A+++.

tag_professor: Inspirational (3)  Respected (3)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
comments: Very caring, funny, inspirational woman! Just show up, read the material, participate, and laugh. She wants you to get an A. She really cares and she saved my semester! And yes, she does throw chocolates at you when you answer correctly.

comments: She is hysterical. Not a lot of homework. She just asks you to read, but then goes over it the next class. Motivates you with candy. Take home quizzes and tests. Very easy. I love this class
